entropy.configuration

Interface Node

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ManagedElement

    public interface Node
extends ManagedElement
    Interface to specify a working node. A node has a certain CPU and memory capacity that can be used to run VMs.
    The nodes are modifiable to reduce the number of interfaces required.
    Author:
    Fabien Hermenier

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean addPlatform(String id)
      Add a possible hosting platform for this node with no platform specific options.
      void addPlatform(String id, Map<String,String> options)
      Add a possible hosting platform for this node with given options If it is the first added platform, it becomes the current hosting platform If a platform with a same identifier is already in, it is overriden

      • getCurrentPlatform

        String getCurrentPlatform()
        Get the current platform deployed on the node.
        Returns:
        the identifier of the currently deployed platform if any. null otherwise

      • setCurrentPlatform

        boolean setCurrentPlatform(String k)
        Set the current platform on this node. The platform must already be available for this node
        Parameters:
        k - the identifier of the platform
        Returns:
        true if the platform has been set, false if the platform is not available

      • addPlatform

        boolean addPlatform(String id)
        Add a possible hosting platform for this node with no platform specific options. If it is the first added platform, it becomes the current hosting platform If a platform with a same identifier is already in, there is no addition
        Parameters:
        id - the identifier of the platform
        Returns:
        true if a platform was added

      • addPlatform

        void addPlatform(String id,
               Map<String,String> options)
        Add a possible hosting platform for this node with given options If it is the first added platform, it becomes the current hosting platform If a platform with a same identifier is already in, it is overriden
        Parameters:
        id - the identifier of the platform
        options - the options for the platform

      • getAvailablePlatforms

        Set<String> getAvailablePlatforms()
        Get the available platform for this node.
        Returns:
        a set of platform identifier. May be empty

      • setIPAddress

        void setIPAddress(String ip)
        Set the IP address of this node.
        Parameters:
        ip - the IP address

      • setMACAddress

        void setMACAddress(String address)
        set the MAC Address of this node.
        Parameters:
        address - a MAC address that may be null

      • getPlatformOptions

        Map<String,String> getPlatformOptions(String p)
        Get the options associated to a platform
        Parameters:
        p - the platform identifier
        Returns:
        a map of option if the platform is available on this node. null otherwise

      • isPowerSwitchable

        boolean isPowerSwitchable()
        set wether the server can be powered on or off. True means it can be switched on, then off.
        Returns:
        the presence of an ability to switch the server power on or off.

      • setPowerSwitchable

        void setPowerSwitchable(boolean powerswitchable)
        set the capacity of the server to be shut down then restarted.
        Parameters:
        powerswitchable - the isPowerSwitchable() valu to set
